GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: Serves a single article based on the provided article ID

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Serves an array of all comments for a given article

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Posts a new comment on a specific article

requestBody.username: required - The username of the commenter
requestBody.body: required - The body text of the comment

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: Increments or decrements the vote count of a specific article

requestBody.inc_votes: required - Can be a positive or negative integer to increment/decrement votes
